title: Privacy Policy
text: 1. The FixDrive service collects and processes users' personal data (name, contact information, location, ride history) solely for the purpose of providing transportation services, improving service quality, and complying with legal requirements. 2. Data may be shared with third parties only as required by law or to fulfill an order (e.g., to the driver for ride fulfillment). 3. The service takes all necessary measures to protect personal data from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. 4. The user has the right to request deletion or modification of their data through support. 5. Use of the service constitutes the user's consent to this privacy policy. 6. In case of changes to the policy, the current version is published in the app.
